Lecture.Description:
- The property of executing multiple threads and processes at the same time is referred to as concurrency - when only one cpu, only one thread is running at a given time - for multi core cpu systems there are more and more threads. - Thread scheduler comes into play. - It gives some cpu cycles for each thread to run - when a threads alloted time is finished but its task is not finished yet a contect switch occurs: storing current state of thread. And later restore its state - thread priority - numeric value
Thread.MIN_PRIORITY 1 Thread.NORM_PRIORITY 5 Thread.MAX_PRIORITY 10
